EXPONENT.doc: EXPONENT(X) returns the exponent part of a floating-point number X. [F90]

FRACTION.doc: FRACTION(X) returns the fractional part of the model representation of X. [F90]

NEAREST.doc: NEAREST(X,S) returns the nearest representable number to X in the direction of sign S. [F90]

RRSPACING.doc: RRSPACING(X) returns the reciprocal of the relative spacing of model numbers near X. [F90]

SCALE.doc: SCALE(X,I) returns X * RADIX(X)**I, scaling by a power of the radix. [F90]

SET_EXPONENT.doc: SET_EXPONENT(X,I) returns a number with FRACTION(X) and exponent I. [F90]

SPACING.doc: SPACING(X) returns the absolute spacing of model numbers near X. [F90]
